description: The initiative focuses on creating a global platform aimed at strengthening businesses and fostering ecosystems around common themes such as climate, agriculture, and gender. It operates in Colombia, particularly in Medell√≠n, where it collaborates with local entities to empower communities and enhance agricultural practices. The program emphasizes sustainable development goals and seeks to address specific territorial needs. By providing resources and technical support, the initiative aims to improve production methods, promote economic independence, and facilitate access to markets, ultimately contributing to a more resilient agri-food ecosystem.
name: Impact Hub
